oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Albert Morton in the kitchen
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Color photograph of Albert Morton smiling while standing at the stove and cooking chicken. After his sister Maude Webb died, Albert cooked for Margaret and Elise Croft until his death in 1973.
Albert Morton (1913-1973) was the fifth child of Frank and Agnes Morton. He lived on the property and worked for the Croft sisters after his father passed away.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: African Americans--Tennessee; Household employees; Agricultural laborers--Tennessee
Color photographs; Interiors; Kitchens
